name: Mantas
overview:
Mantas, Inc., a software company, provides regulatory compliance, loss prevention, and revenue generation solutions. It offers a behavior detection platform for financial institutions and communications service providers. The companyâ€™s regulatory compliance solutions include anti-money laundering, and trading, broker, and mutual fund compliance; loss prevention solutions include fraud detection and operational risk analysis; and revenue generation solutions include client assurance. It has operations in Europe, the Americas, and the Asia/Pacific.

The company is headquartered in Herndon, Virginia with additional offices in London, the United Kingdom; New York, New York; and Singapore, Singapore. Mantas, Inc. is a subsidiary of Oracle Corp.
